data.event: In 1799, Joseph Foveaux was granted 300 acres (1.2 km2), which he expanded to over 2,000 acres (8.1 km2) and later sold to John Macarthur in 1801.
In 1799, Joseph Foveaux was granted 300 acres (1.2 km2), which he expanded to over 2,000 acres (8.1 km2) and later sold to John Macarthur in 1801.

event.title: were killed on the farm by natives in 1805

data.event: Two of Macarthur's stockmen were killed on the farm by natives in 1805.

event.title: was sold by the Pearces in 1950

data.event: Bella Vista was sold by the Pearces in 1950.
